input_data.title: Sherwood
input_data.overview: All her life, teen-hacker Robin of Sherwood thought she was an orphan. But when a mysterious Gauntlet unlocks a secret that turns her world upside down, Robin joins forces with a group of renegades who teach her the true value of love, loyalty, and sacrifice. Through the flooded storm-lashed streets of 23rd century London, to the towering citadel of the floating Upper City, Robin and her new friends battle the elements and the odds to defeat the mad Sheriff of Nottingham.

response.analytical_summary: Sherwood is a visually dynamic animated series blending science fiction, fantasy, and action-adventure elements. The narrative follows a young woman who discovers a hidden past and joins a group of rebels to confront a tyrannical authority figure. The series explores themes of identity, loyalty, and sacrifice within a dystopian setting, offering a fast-paced and action-packed experience with a focus on character relationships and a fight for freedom.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Robin, a seemingly orphaned teenager living in a technologically advanced but oppressive London. Her life is disrupted when she discovers a mysterious Gauntlet, a device that unlocks a hidden truth about her origins and reveals a conspiracy within the ruling powers. Robin is drawn into a rebellion led by a group of skilled individuals who teach her combat skills and expose her to the harsh realities of their fight against the Sheriff of Nottingham. As Robin delves deeper into the rebellion, she uncovers a complex web of secrets surrounding her own parentage and the true nature of the Sheriff's regime. The rebellion faces numerous setbacks and betrayals, forcing Robin and her allies to make difficult choices and confront their own personal demons. The final confrontation involves a desperate attempt to overthrow the Sheriff and dismantle his oppressive system, culminating in a battle for the future of London and the revelation of Robinâ€™s true destiny.
response.keyword_sentence: Sherwood is a young-adult sci-fi fantasy series set in a dystopian future London, where a rebellious hero embarks on an identity quest with a found-family to fight against oppression and reclaim freedom.
